input.sentences: i went to a rally for education .
the people were upset about the government cutting school budgets .
they believed that education is the most important thing .
they picketed at the location building .
they viewed education as an investment .
output.sentences: I was on the way to meet up with a friend.
Then I came across a bunch of protesters.
Their message is loud and clear.
I am on their side because the children are the fucture.
We have to make sure we do whatever it takes to make sure their future is bright.
